title: 516. Tackle a Task You've Been Putting Off
description:
We all have those dreaded tasks in our quilting lives – the ones that hang over your head and make you feel drained just thinking about starting them. We share a few easy tips for tackling those tedious tasks. We also talk about sewing products we're loving right now, share tips for using thrift store finds in your sewing room, and chat with Renee Savage of Renee's House of Quilting.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-516-tackle-a-task-youve-been-putting-off
Email us at APQPodcast@meredith.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: American Patchwork & Quilting
itunes:subtitle: Learn to get your tedious tasks done, so you can enjoy the sewing process more!
